channel.title: Requesting title screen error? [PI]
channel.description:
Does anyone know how to fix the requesting title screen error on Deathlypvpz v4.1?? I have re-zipped, uploaded the cache to dropbox, copied the link, placed it in cachedownloader.java compiled with no complications or errors, I have jarred and signed it correctly about 5 times to be sure it wasn't that, changed the name in signlink.java, compiled with no errors. I already have the cache in my C:\Users\(Myusername) but when i move it to the desktop to test the autocache downloader, it gets to about 30 something percent then gives the requesting title screen error :( :confused: :confused:
:palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: :palm: EDIT: I cannot have been more stupid, I zipped the files incorrectly so there was a folder inside the archive containing the files..

item.title: Requesting title screen error? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Damoiscool Damoiscool
